item.title: About
item.description: A simple person, easy to communicate and who loves good coffee, good music, a good book, a good movie, a good company (most often my wife Amanda’s). I have a tremendous facility of getting to know people, I like to share experiences and I strive to make life less heavy than it tends to be. SRE, DevOps and Containers evangelist, Solutions Architect Iâ€™ve made significant contributions with development, translation, review, patch and dissemination of open source technology.
